permissions: Allowed for admins, members of the broker, or managers of a customer whose broker matches the contractor broker.
side_effects: Updates contractor fields; changing the name triggers job production plan facts summary updates.
validation_notes: A contractor ID argument is required. At least one updatable attribute must be provided. Only name is updatable; broker relationships cannot be changed. Name cannot be blank and must be unique per broker.

flags.name: --name
flags.validation: If provided, must be non-blank. Example: Acme Contractors
